sources.title: Hue and Cry
sources.description: A gang of street boys foil a master crook who sends commands for robberies by cunningly altering a comic strip's wording each week, unknown to writer and printer. The first of the Ealing comedies.

metadata.Plot: A gang of street boys foil a master crook who sends commands for robberies by cunningly altering a comic strip's wording each week, unknown to writer and printer. The first of the Ealing comedies.
metadata.Actors: Alastair Sim, Frederick Piper, Harry Fowler
